attributes.action: get all British forces out of Iraq and Afganistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the war in iraq and afgan is out of control and while there counties cannot police itself, our troops are sacrificing themselves in some of the most dangerous places on earth. there welfare is also in danger, with young soldiers being killed, and older soldiers being killed, there families are left helpless, many families are dependant on there income coming from there other half who is in the forces. i know this as i myself was dependent on my fathers income. everyweek day in day out we hear about troops being killed, young soldiers being killed, and yet this morning osama bin ladens 'right hand man' has been released into Britian. GET THE TROOPS OUT OF IRAQ AND AFGAHN , BEFORE WE SUFFER ANY MORE CASULTIES !!!!! Its not our war. lets stop the suffering, stop the heartache and despair that many families have to go through and help the welfare of those who are suffering.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
